sentences.en: This has been a timely reminder to us all.
sentences.cn: 对我们大家来说这个提醒非常及时。

sentences.en: A nasty incident was prevented by the timely arrival of the police.
sentences.cn: 警察的及时到来阻止了一次严重事故。

sentences.en: The incident served as a timely reminder of just how dangerous mountaineering can be.
sentences.cn: 这次事故及时地提醒了人们登山运动有时会多么危险。
